properties.headline: Flood Watch issued January 9 at 9:57AM CST until January 13 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood Watch
for the following rivers in Indiana...

Little Calumet River at Munster (Hohman Avenue) affecting Lake
County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 72 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Flood Watch for
The Little Calumet River at Munster (Hohman Avenue), or from IN-912
in Hammond downstream to confluence with Thorn Creek in South
Holland.
* from late Friday night to late Sunday night.
* At  9:00 AM Thursday the stage was 5.5 feet.
* Moderate flooding is possible.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Forecast...Flood stage may be reached by Saturday morning. The
river may crest near 16 feet Saturday evening.
* Impact...At 16.5 feet...Without flood protection, widespread
inundation of roadways and structures reaches up to 5 blocks from
the river in Calumet City and Lansing.
